Title: Increases the maximum sentence of imprisonment for certain misdemeanors to one year; repealer
Summary: Increases the maximum sentence of imprisonment for certain misdemeanors to one year.
LawCode: Rpld ยง70.15 sub 1-a, amd ยง70.15, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the maximum sentence of imprisonment for certain misdemeanors to one year; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
